name: Basic Platformer (Rayan Aziz)
description:
I created this Small prototype of a Game in 3 days... I Used BOLT Visual Scripting in Unity.. this is made entirely with Visual Scripting not a Single C# Script. This was a Good Practice for me and you can download it for free and yea you can donate too :)

Feel free to ask any Questions you have.. I'll try to reply <3

Assets Used:

Character: https://darkpixel-kronovi.itch.io/rogue-knight

Tileset: https://essssam.itch.io/rocky-roads
